name: The Suitcase
description:
Your job is to retrieve The Suitcase, don't ever open it and don't ask what is inside, just take it back. You won't be alone on this mission, Billy and Jimmy are always at your side to help you kick some ass.

Enter the Practice Mode to learn your combos, how to manage hordes of enemies, how to combine your attacks with your allies and learn the timing for blocking and dodge rolling.

  • Each level has minibosses. Will you skip them or fight them to death?
  • Beware of the police, those party poopers!!! Don't let time run out or they will come after you.
  • Tons of masks to choose from. What's your style?
  • Bored of the normal (too easy?) difficulty? Try the Expert or Master level then!
  • Play with any device, the touchscreen, a keyboard. Have a gamepad lying around? You can use it too!
  • Play with someone else, it's more fun. Just connect to another gamepad.
  • Prefer to be stealthy? Then kill your enemies without them knowing what hit them. You decide how to play the game.
